name: Staff Of Flames
description: A staff imbued with the essence of fire, capable of unleashing devastating flames upon its foes.
tooltip: Firebolts (60%): Deals 2-8 + 5 * INT bonus fire damage. This attack builds up FIRE 1.5x
Flamethrower (30%): Deals 4-16 + 5 * INT bonus * 1.6x fire damage. This attack has a +10% critical chance, 5% increased accuracy and builds up FIRE 1.6x
Fireball (10%): Deals 3-15 + 5 * INT bonus * 1.25x fire damage. This attack has a +15% critical chance, 5% increased accuracy and builds up FIRE 1.25x.
